value_claims.claim_title: 40% reduction in unplanned asset downtime across 3 counties
value_claims.claim_description: By leveraging predictive analytics through IBM Maximo Application Suite, the initiative achieved a 40% reduction in unplanned asset downtime across three counties in the Stonecrest area.
value_claims.source_quote: By leveraging predictive analytics, the initiative achieved a 40% reduction in unplanned asset downtime across three counties.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Predictive analytics is an AI capability directly responsible for identifying and preventing asset failures before they occur.

value_claims.claim_title: 60% decrease in manual field response times
value_claims.claim_description: Smart workflows enabled by watsonx Orchestrate led to a 60% decrease in manual field response times, significantly improving operational agility in asset management and workforce coordination.
value_claims.source_quote: Smart workflows enabled by watsonx Orchestrate led to a 60% decrease in manual field response times, significantly improving operational agility.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: watsonx Orchestrate is an AI-powered automation solution that directly enables smart workflows to reduce manual response times.

value_claims.claim_title: 18% reduction in peak load costs through energy monitoring
value_claims.claim_description: Clean energy monitoring contributed to an 18% reduction in peak load costs, improving energy distribution efficiency and cost management.
value_claims.source_quote: Clean energy monitoring contributed to an 18% reduction in peak load costs
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Energy monitoring systems typically use AI for optimization, though the specific AI contribution is not explicitly detailed in the source.

value_claims.claim_title: 30% decrease in water waste in agriculture through automation
value_claims.claim_description: Automation in agriculture drove a 30% decrease in water waste, demonstrating environmental and resource efficiency improvements.
value_claims.source_quote: automation in agriculture drove a 30% decrease in water waste
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automation systems in agriculture typically incorporate AI for optimization, though specific AI mechanisms are not detailed in the source.

value_claims.claim_title: 30% increase in deployment speed compared to earlier projects
value_claims.claim_description: The initiative delivered a 30% increase in deployment speed compared to previous projects, demonstrating improved project execution velocity.
value_claims.source_quote: The initiative also delivered a 30% increase in deployment speed compared to previous projects
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Deployment speed improvements are attributed to the overall system including AI components like Maximo and watsonx Orchestrate, though not solely AI-driven.

value_claims.claim_title: $2.3 million cost avoidance over three years with 10x ROI
value_claims.claim_description: The initiative is projected to generate USD 2.3 million in cost avoidance over three years, with a 10x return on investment through predictive maintenance and operational optimization.
value_claims.source_quote: it is projected to generate USD 2.3 million in cost avoidance over three years, with a 10x return on investment.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost avoidance is directly attributed to AI-powered predictive analytics and automation capabilities of Maximo and watsonx Orchestrate.

value_claims.claim_title: 120 new jobs created in sustainability and smart infrastructure
value_claims.claim_description: Beyond operational gains, the project created 120 new jobs in sustainability and smart infrastructure, empowering local talent and supporting inclusive innovation.
value_claims.source_quote: the project also created 120 new jobs in sustainability and smart infrastructure, empowering local talent
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Job creation is an indirect outcome of the AI-enabled infrastructure project, not directly caused by AI capabilities themselves.

context_claims.claim_title: Georgia Institute of Technology is a top public research university
context_claims.claim_description: Georgia Tech is one of the top public research universities in the US with more than 50,000 students across multiple campuses and distance learning programs.
context_claims.source_quote: The Georgia Institute of Technology is one of the top public research universities in the US. It has more than 50,000 students

context_claims.claim_title: Higher education and public sector infrastructure
context_claims.claim_description: The initiative operates at the intersection of higher education, municipal infrastructure, and community development in Stonecrest, Georgia.
context_claims.source_quote: This work, piloted in Stonecrest, Georgia, laid the foundation for a collaboration with Georgia Institute of Technology

context_claims.claim_title: Focus on sustainability, workforce development, and community resilience
context_claims.claim_description: The project emphasizes sustainability, workforce development, and community resilience with equitable, long-term impact as core strategic objectives.
context_claims.source_quote: The project's emphasis on sustainability, workforce development, and community resilience offers students a meaningful opportunity to apply their skills toward equitable, long-term impact.

context_claims.claim_description: The initiative focuses on asset management, predictive maintenance, and infrastructure optimization across municipal systems.
context_claims.source_quote: Georgia Tech partners with Avid Solutions and IBM to revolutionize Stonecrest's asset management, energy distribution and workforce coordination

context_claims.claim_description: The project addresses energy distribution challenges including peak load management and clean energy monitoring.
context_claims.source_quote: revolutionize Stonecrest's asset management, energy distribution and workforce coordination

context_claims.claim_description: The initiative spans three counties in Georgia, representing a regional-scale infrastructure transformation.
context_claims.source_quote: 40% reduction in unplanned asset downtime across three counties

context_claims.claim_title: Three-year projection period with future expansion planned
context_claims.claim_description: The initiative includes a three-year cost avoidance projection and plans for expansion in 2025 through capstone collaboration with students.
context_claims.source_quote: projected to generate USD 2.3 million in cost avoidance over three years... Avid Solutions and Georgia Tech will deepen their involvement in solutions across the state of Georgia in 2025

context_claims.claim_title: Partnership for Inclusive Innovation (PIN) statewide reach
context_claims.claim_description: PIN has supported 20 communities and activated over 140 technologies statewide across Georgia, providing the broader context for this initiative.
context_claims.source_quote: The Partnership for Inclusive Innovation (PIN) is driving applied, community-oriented innovation across Georgia, having supported 20 communities and activated over 140 technologies statewide.

context_claims.claim_title: IBM Maximo Application Suite and watsonx Orchestrate deployment
context_claims.claim_description: The initiative deployed IBM Maximo Application Suite for asset management and watsonx Orchestrate for automation, chosen for scalability and interoperability.
context_claims.source_quote: The initiative centered on deploying the IBM Maximo Application Suite asset management solution and the IBM watsonx Orchestrate automation solution, chosen for their scalability, interoperability and ability to support public-private integration.

context_claims.claim_title: Shift from reactive to predictive governance model
context_claims.claim_description: The transformation represents a strategic shift from reactive to predictive governance, enabling faster, data-driven decisions through intelligent automation.
context_claims.source_quote: This transformation marks a shift from reactive to predictive governance, where intelligent automation enables faster, data-driven decisions.
